description: With their time in Cardiff at an end everyone hopes they done enough to stay working for Jordan and AK.  A trip to a strip club splits the boys turning the house into a battlefield and old scores are settled with a surprise arrival at the big event. Aron kicks off and underwear is flying as the Valley kids put on the biggest night of their lives. Tears of joy turn to sadness when everyone says goodbye as they head back to the valleys but for some it will be back to the Valleys for good.
